TopicTitle: Delta V requirements for orbiting various moons..

Articles.Content:
So I'm planning on building a sort of grand-tour ship, and one of the things I'd like to be able to do is re-fuel at various airless moons. However, one thing I can't seem to find is delta V charts for getting into circular orbits from the surface of planets/moons, does anyone have a link to a chart or calculator for it?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-26T03:19:36Z" title="07/26/2015 03:19  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 26, 2015</time> by PanzerAce**

Have a look at the Delta-V maps.

- [WAC's Delta-V Map Continued](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/96985)
- [A more accurate delta-v map](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/120030?p=1960225&viewfull=1#post1960225)
- [http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Cheat_Sheet](http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Cheat_Sheet)
- [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/125309-1-02-Delta-V-map](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/125309-1-02-Delta-V-map)
- [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/25360-Delta-V-map](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/25360-Delta-V-map)

They have the dV requirements for landing on airless bodies. Usually I take the same number for estimating the dV requirement for launching from the bodies to a low orbit (10km).
You, sir, are a gentleman and a scholar.
